data.name: Tauren
data.description:
Tauren

Units:
+10% hit points
+1 HP/sec regeneration
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Traits: Slow and steady wins the race! It is not about dealing damage, its about outliving enemy. Damage output rises slowly and peaks in late game. It depends on brute force and so cannot be denied or dispelled.

Difficulty: Advanced

auras.name: Paralysis Aura
auras.description:
-20% unit move speed
(does not affect Special unit)
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Arcane Aura
auras.description:
+4 HP/s unit regeneration
(affects organic units only)
(3500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+15% unit attack and move speed
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Mistrunner Druidess [R]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Earth's Embrace

Mistrunner Druidess replaces Medium
Spellcaster
+8 damage
+25 MP
Abilities:
Gravity Pull (Disable Spell) (Ground)
(slows unit by 15/20/25/30%)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Gravity Pull (Disable Spell) (Air)
(brings down Air unit)
(lasts 15/30/45/60 sec)
Upgrades used:
Spiritism (Upgrades Abilities)
Arcanite Armor
Earth's Shield

Type: Debuffing / Anti Air

units.name: Mistrunner Druidess
units.description:
Spellcaster
Strong Vs Melee Unit
Weak Vs Ranged Unit

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Merchant
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Pawn Item [Z]
spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:

You get +50% gold bounty for killing Heroes.
(let the dumb nabs feed you...)

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.name: Fuck Heroes (Lv1)
upgrades.description:
Gives:
+15% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

towerUpgrades.name: Axe Mastery
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: crit chance and attack rate
Affects: Axeman
(2x damage and 0.7 sec stun)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 11% crucial hit, +5% attack rate
Lv2: 20% crucial hit, +10% attack rate
Lv3: 28% crucial hit, +15% attack rate
Lv4: 35% crucial hit, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Unyielding Stamina
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: HP and damage block
Affects: Axeman, Pikeslinger and Champion

Lv1: +25 HP, 20% to block 30 damage
Lv2: +50 HP, 25% to block 40 damage
Lv3: +75 HP, 30% to block 50 damage
Lv4: +100 HP, 35% to block 60 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Impaling Force
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage and stun
Affects: Pikeslinger, Slingshot and Pike Tower
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 11% for 2.25x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv2: 20% for 2.5x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv3: 28% for 2.75x damage, 1 sec stun
Lv4: 35% for 3x damage, 1 sec stun

towerUpgrades.name: Strong Right
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage, range and attack rate
Affects: Pikeslinger

Lv1: +8 damage, +25 range, +5% attack rate
Lv2: +16 damage, +50 range, +10% attack rate
Lv3: +24 damage, +75 range, +15% attack rate
Lv4: +32 damage, +100 range, +20% attack rate

towerUpgrades.name: Pulverize
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to do area damage
Affects: Champion

Lv1: 11% to do 45 damage in 180 AoE
Lv2: 20% to do 60 damage in 200 AoE
Lv3: 28% to do 75 damage in 220 AoE
Lv4: 35% to do 90 damage in 240 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Nature's Embrace
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: self healing ability
Affects: Axeman, Pikeslinger and Champion

Lv1: 150 HP over 10 sec
Lv2: 300 HP over 12 sec
Lv3: 450 HP over 14 sec
Lv4: 600 HP over 16 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Earth's Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: armor increase ability
Affects: Medium
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: +3 armor for 60 sec
Lv2: +6 armor for 80 sec
Lv3: +9 armor for 100 sec
Lv4: +12 armor for 120 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Poison Stinger
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: deals damage over time
Affects: Wyvern
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 9 damage/sec for 10 sec
Lv2: 18 damage/sec for 12 sec
Lv3: 27 damage/sec for 14 sec
Lv4: 36 damage/sec for 16 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Proof of Strength
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus damage in 1500 AoE
Affects: Killed enemy Heroes
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)

Lv1: +25% damage for 30 sec
Lv2: +50% damage for 60 sec
Lv3: +75% damage for 90 sec
Lv4: +100% damage for 120 sec

t1spell.name: Slingshot Barrage [Z]
t1spell.description:

(has 3s delay after activation)
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

skills.name: The Horde - Tauren
skills.description:
Units:
+10% hit points
+1 HP/sec regeneration
-10% attack rate

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Traits: Slow and steady wins the race! It is not about dealing damage, its about outliving enemy. Damage output rises slowly and peaks in late game. It depends on brute force and so cannot be denied or dispelled.

Difficulty: Advanced

skills.name: Sacrifice Ritual [C]
skills.description:
Kill friendly unit to summon help.
Cooldown: 240 seconds.
